dt: {bc}to diversify in external appearance especially with different colors {bc}{sx|dapple||}
{bc}to enliven or give interest to by means of {a_link|variety}

et: borrowed from Latin {it}variegātus{/it}, past participle of {it}variegāare{/it} "to diversify with different colors," from {it}varius{/it} "having contrasting colors, {et_link|various:1|various:1}" + {it}-egāre{/it}, variant of {it}-igāare{/it}, verb suffix based on {it}-ig-{/it}, nominal derivative of {it}agere{/it} "to drive, do," as in {it}rēmig-, rēmex{/it} "oarsman," hence {it}rēmigāre{/it} "to row" {ma}{mat|agent|}{/ma}
shortdef: to diversify in external appearance especially with different colors : dapple
to enliven or give interest to by means of variety
